scripts.lint: pnpm -w exec biome check . && pnpm -w exec eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings=0
scripts.fix: pnpm -w exec biome format --write . && pnpm -w exec biome check --fix .
scripts.codex:protocol:gen: pnpm -w exec mkdir -p packages/codex-app-server-protocol/src/generated && pnpm -w exec codex app-server generate-ts --out packages/codex-app-server-protocol/src/generated && pnpm -w exec node scripts/codex-app-server-protocol-postprocess.mjs
scripts.codex:schema:gen: pnpm -w exec mkdir -p tools/codex-schemas/app-server-protocol && pnpm -w exec codex app-server generate-json-schema --out tools/codex-schemas/app-server-protocol
scripts.codex:gen:check: pnpm -s codex:gen && pnpm -w exec git diff --exit-code -- packages/codex-app-server-protocol/src/generated tools/codex-schemas/app-server-protocol
